mapper.delete: delete from chas_xt_sign where rybh = #{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and sign_type = #{signType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into chas_xt_sign (id, isdel, data_flag, lrr_sfzh, lrsj, xgr_sfzh, xgsj, rybh, ryxm, zbdw_bh, sign_type, sign_name, img_body) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdel,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{dataFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ryxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zbdwBh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update chas_xt_sign set isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, data_flag = #{dataFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lrr_sfzh = #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lrsj = #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, xgr_sfzh = #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGSJ = date_trunc('second', now()), rybh = #{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ryxm = #{ryxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zbdw_bh = #{zbdwBh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign_type = #{signType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign_name = #{signName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_body = #{imgBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, isdel, data_flag, lrr_sfzh, lrsj, xgr_sfzh, xgsj, rybh, ryxm, zbdw_bh, sign_type, sign_name, img_body from chas_xt_sign where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and isdel != 1

select id, isdel, data_flag, lrr_sfzh, lrsj, xgr_sfzh, xgsj, rybh, ryxm, zbdw_bh, sign_type, sign_name, img_body from chas_xt_sign
1=1 and isdel = 0
and rybh = '${rybh}'
and sign_type = '${signType}'
and sign_type in
'${item}'
select * from chas_xt_sign where isdel = 0 and sign_type = '${type}' and rybh = '${rybh}' order by lrsj desc limit 1
